attributes.action: CONSIDER ALTERNATIVES WAYS TO REDUCE CO 2 EMISSIONS AND CONGESTION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Motorists should be given financial incentives/bonuses to exchange conventional fuel vehicles for eg hydrogen powered or electrically powered vehicles and disencentives to own more than one vehicle per household.
Money for public transport should come from income tax not road taxes in all their guises as public transport benefits everybody. Motorists should not be the milch cow to fund all kinds of improvements to the Transport Network.

rejection.details: Please re-submit without blocks caps in the title.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
